about_the_game:
If you go out in the woods today, you're in for a big surprise.


Your years of experience hiking and camping have led you to this moment: the forbidden part of the forest known only as "Sooty's Rest".

Never Meet Your Heroes


Everyone knows the story of Sooty The Bear, the lovable fire prevention mascot whose face and slogan have been seen on countless posters, commercials, and billboards for over 70 years. What they don't know is that Sooty is real, and you've just entered his territory. Once you set up camp and start your campfire, Sooty knows you're there.

Survive and Escape


  • Navigate the Wilderness: Use your skills with a compass and flashlight to find your way to safety before Sooty finds you.
  • Distract and Evade: Start campfires to distract Sooty and keep him off your trail.
  • Plan Your Escape: Use park maps to plot your route out of the park.
  • Hide and Seek: Hide in bear lockers, bathrooms, and ranger stations to stay safe during the night.
  • Stay on Track: Try not to get lost.

Sooty's Rest is a thrilling horror indie game that combines elements of psychological horror and survival horror in a wilderness setting. With a chilling atmosphere and relentless pursuit by Sooty, you'll need all your wits and courage to make it out alive.

Will you make it out, or will Sooty find you first?

content_descriptors.notes: This is a game about a bear who wants to kill you.  There will be blood and violence as you are captured by Sooty.  In addition, there may be mangled corpses of Sooty's victims as you progress from level to level.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon XE
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5500, AMD Radeon R5
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Enter "Sooty's Rest," the forbidden forest where the legendary fire prevention mascot, Sooty The Bear, is real. Use your compass, flashlight, and survival skills to escape his pursuit. Navigate, hide, and outsmart Sooty in this thrilling wilderness survival horror game. Can you make it out alive?
